channel.title: Comments on: Day 29 – Never a Dull Moment – Thursday, May 4

item.title: By: mary l scriva
item.dc:creator: mary l scriva
item.description: Kim, I know this past month has been about your mom and we are so greatful to be able to keep up with her progress thru this site that you and Chad take the time out of your hectic day to post , for that I want to say thank you both so much, sometimes its not just the patient that needs to know people are rooting for them, its also the ones who love them enough to go thru the process with them unconditionally that need some rooting also , so here it is ,prayers for you and your family to keep the strength, and yes it is always o.k. to cry . thanks again, Mary
item.content:encoded: Kim, I know this past month has been about your mom and we are so greatful to be able to keep up with her progress thru this site that you and Chad take the time out of your hectic day to post , for that I want to say thank you both so much, sometimes its not just the patient that needs to know people are rooting for them, its also the ones who love them enough to go thru the process with them unconditionally that need some rooting also , so here it is ,prayers for you and your family to keep the strength, and yes it is always o.k. to cry . thanks again, Mary
